Abstract: How do you mark the passage of 1,000 years of human history? Simple in Hong Kong, a city of chronic gamblers and cold-eyed oddsmakers: you head for the track.    At 12:45 a.m., as the last wisps of smoke from New Year's Eve fireworks drifted away from the Happy Valley Racecourse, the crack of a starter's gun set off the Millennium Cup.
LeadParagraph: How do you mark the passage of 1,000 years of human history? Simple in Hong Kong, a city of chronic gamblers and cold-eyed oddsmakers: you head for the track.

Headline.Main: A Day at the Races, A Night of Big Parties
